content: **flamingo summer top ** ======================================= the flamingo summer top is an easy crochet top with a simple lace feature along the neckline **top sizing & fit** this top pattern is written for 9 sizes to fit bust measurements as follows xs 28 - 30 / 71 - 76cm s 32 - 34 / 81 - 86cm m 36 - 38 / 91 5 - 96 5cm l 40 - 42 / 101 5 - 106 5cm xl 44 - 46 / 111 5 - 117cm 2x 48 - 50 / 122 - 127cm 3x 52 - 54 / 132 - 137cm 4x 56 - 58 / 142 - 147cm 5x 60 - 62 / 152 - 158cm the top has a classic but comfortable fit with approx 2 -4 positive ease on the bust this top is a perfect first garment the back and front panels are identical there is no shaping involved and minimal seaming --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2021 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
